title: Tests failed and take long time with MSSQL container
body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?
Running tests with docker: 
`cd yii2/tests/mssql`
`docker-compose run --rm php vendor/bin/phpunit -v --group mssql`
### What is the expected result?
Run tests in an acceptable time
### What do you get instead?
```
docker-compose run --rm php vendor/bin/phpunit -v --group mssql
Starting mssql_mssql_1 ... done
PHPUnit 4.8.34 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:	PHP 7.0.32-0ubuntu0.16.04.1 with Xdebug 2.4.0
Configuration:	/project/phpunit.xml.dist

SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS  63 / 543 ( 11%)
SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS 126 / 543 ( 23%)
SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS 189 / 543 ( 34%)
SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS.SEE.SSSSSSSSESEESSSSSSSSSEEEEEEFE..... 252 / 543 ( 46%)
..........................F..F................................. 315 / 543 ( 58%)
.........SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS............EEEESSSSSSSSSSSSEE.EEEEE 378 / 543 ( 69%)
................................SSSSSIS.SSSSS..........SSSSSSSS 441 / 543 ( 81%)
SSSSSSSSSSS.SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS 504 / 543 ( 92%)
SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSEESSEEE

You should really fix these slow tests (>500ms)...
 1. 45020ms to run yiiunit\framework\web\session\mssql\DbSessionTest:testReadWrite
 2. 45018ms to run yiiunit\framework\web\session\mssql\DbSessionTest:testInstantiate
 3. 45016ms to run yiiunit\framework\web\session\mssql\DbSessionTest:testMigration
 4. 45012ms to run yiiunit\framework\web\session\mssql\DbSessionTest:testSerializedObjectSaving
 5. 45011ms to run yiiunit\framework\web\session\mssql\DbSessionTest:testInitializeWithConfig
 6. 15017ms to run yiiunit\framework\db\mssql\ActiveQueryTest:testGetQueryTableName_from_not_set
 7. 15014ms to run yiiunit\framework\db\mssql\QueryBuilderTest:testInitFixtures
 8. 15011ms to run yiiunit\framework\db\mssql\SchemaTest:testGetPDOType
 9. 15011ms to run yiiunit\framework\db\mssql\ActiveDataProviderTest:testActiveQuery
 10. 15009ms to run yiiunit\framework\db\mssql\ConnectionTest:testServerStatusCacheWorks
...and there are 370 more above your threshold hidden from view

Time: 1.62 hours, Memory: 56.00MB

```

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.16-dev
| PHP version      | 7.2.10
| Operating system | ubuntu 18.04.1
| MSSQL version | 2017
| MSSQL driver | sqlsrv
